Live Stream-A young man eager to get into the world live streaming. In a quest to get more viewers for his video game channel someone manipulates him into a whole other type of channel. He is slowly guilted and manipulated against his will into becoming the next influencer, and Cam Girl.

Trophy Wife-Your girlfriends dad Ronald never liked you very much. He was rich and powerful while you were definitely not that. One day you wake up in his bed and feeling very different. Ronald has somehow turned you into a beautiful woman and his new wife! How will you survive your new life? How will your girlfriend turned daughter handle this, and how will life as a trophy wife treat the former pretty boy.

My three daughters- You are a man in his mid 20's who is married to a beautiful older woman with three daughters 19 and 18. His wife’s ex husband in an attempt to get his family back uses his wealth to manipulate the system into turning you into him and his wife's third daughter. How will you survive being a beautiful and busty high school sweetheart, and why is your wife being so agreeable?

112.content:
The room is dark and small, lit only by faint candles as Jennifer is ordered to approach the wooden table in the middle of the room.

“You requested to see me?” Jennifer asks, her face hidden by the hood of her dark brown robe.

“Yes,” the robed man sitting at the table, “your experience in this secret society has been fruitful?”

“It has, my leader.” She responds.

“I’m glad to hear it,” the man says, “because the time has come for you to serve us in our ritualistic sacrifice towards our idols of Mars and Venus.”

“The process where once every thousand years we symbolize the delivery of a servant from Mars to Venus to keep peace within the universe?”

“That’s it,” the man said, “the tale of Yuppa. Royalty that was imprisoned and shipped out to Venus to love the rest of his days as their lowly servant. It’s this ritual that eliminates any hazards from our community from attaining our desires.”

“That’s quite a responsibility to place on me,” Jennifer said, “are you sure I can do it?”

“Are you second guessing me?”

“I would never, my guide“

“Good, I have the utmost faith that you’ll be able to succeed with this. We have your target. We think it’s someone you know...”

“MMMMMMM. Is that for me?” Your wife whispers in your ear. You look into her beautiful blue eyes. You were so lucky to have found this amazing woman. She may have been in her early 40s but you could not have guessed it. Long sexy legs, toned stomach, perfect DD cups, and an ass that a sorority girl would be jealous of.

“You think you got time?” You whisper back.

“ I always have time” She says as she kisses you. Normally you would be more than happy about this, but this morning you kind of wanted her to leave. You see this morning was the morning her teenage daughter went to their dads house for the weekend. You didn't dislike them, things were just kind of awkward. You see you were younger then your wife. While she was the perfect MILF you more of a young pretty boy plaything that she wound up marrying. You were just 7 years older than her youngest daughter, Neither of her two girls were two excited about you being their new step dad. It was weird for them that they went to school with your younger brother until he graduated the previous year.

“Mom! We are ready to go!” IT helped that his step daughters were equally eager to get out of here, and back home with their Tech CEO father.

“Coming girls!” She Shouted and then looked back at you sweetly “I am so ready to have the house by ourselves! This will be the first time since we got married” All I did was smile and nod back at her.

About an hour later your wife and her kids just pulled out of the driveway. As you came back into your house you were startled at the sight of a large man. “Hello Kevin” You heard the dominating voice of your wife's ex husband welcome you into your own home. “I think you're going to take after your mother: He said with an evil smile as you felt a pain in your neck and the room suddenly went black.

131.content:
“Oh honey!” You hear your wife say with remorse in her voice. “How could you Walter!”

“Oh very easily actually. You see I invested in a new genetic tech company that specializes in genetic surgery. I won’t bore you with the details, but basically it re-writes someone on the genetic level and when compounded with other elements it can transform the body. The best part about it is they can harvest someone’s dna and splice it with someone else. Giving someone similar if not identical traits. Imagine being able to by the gene sequence of Mike Tyson, and being able to morph your body into a combination of both of yours. Or let’s say you know a beautiful woman who even though she is beautiful now, doesn’t compare to the sex goddess she was as a teenager. So you wanted to give those same traits to someone else....someone new.....” You felt dread creep up your body. Something is wrong. Very wrong. “ Like our new adopted daughter” You hear him say and your body responds as you jump out of bed and run until you see your self in a bedroom mirror.

Like your step daughters but sexier. Like your wife but younger and tighter. You were clearly part of the family, just not yours.

1313.content:
“THIS IS INSANE!” You scream. Terrified of this twilight zone you now found yourself in. “Can someone please tell me what the hell is going on!? Why do I have tits all of a sudden?!”

“Calm down my dear” You heard Walter say in a very soft, almost patronizing tone. “I can give you an explanation but you are going to have to ask nicely” This time a little more firm. He stared you down, almost challenging you to defy him. You were always a little intimidated by him. He was a well built man in his mid 50’s. Silver and black hair slicked back and piercing blue eyes. While you were a 25 year old pretty boy who was trying to make it as a “influencer”. Well that was you, and now you were something completely different.

“Fine. Walter please tell me what is going on here.” You responded trying not to sound too intimidated, but with your new high pitched girly voice that was hard to avoid.

“Walter? No no no princess. Other men, adults,sometimes your mother. If she's mad at me. Call me Walter” He said with a slight chuckle while winking at your wife. “You are none of those things. You are my daughter, and I like my beautiful daughters to call me “Daddy”.” All the eyes in the room shifted back to where you were standing. At this moment you became extremely aware of your situation. You were the smallest and daintiest person in the room. Even your stepdaughters, while very feminine looked more masculine than you. You looked up at Walter’s smug smile.

“Please what happened to me…. Daddy” Your wife looks down in shame, and your step daughters try to hold back a giggle.

“That's my girl.” H states victoriously “You see I still love my wife and kids, and I wanted them back. I couldn't stand the fact that I lost the love of my life to some feeble little boy toy.”

“You lost me because you were an arrogant asshole!” She screamed at him.

“Semantics. Anyway, I had to get you out of the picture. I couldn't kill you, she could never forgive me for that. How could I get you out of the way and still keep you around? This was answered by my company's R&D department.” He states while taking a vile of pink liquid out of his pocket. “G34R69. A chemical compound containing nanites that allow someone to combine different DNA sequences. It is going to be the new cutting edge in plastic surgery. Now people can by Jenifer Lopez’s ass, or Angelina Jolie's lips and put them on their bodies. Or in your case I took my beautiful wife's DNA along with a little of my own to create you. You are now our genetic 17 year old daughter.” Those last words really hung around. You are now genetically your wife's daughter. You could certainly see the family resemblance. But what part of Walter’s DNA did you get “Every bit of her body is now yours except…. The women in my family tend to be rather “busty”. You are a little bit bigger up top. I think I set it for an E-cup? Don't worry they will get bigger”He winked “ Now I have a lot of work to do getting your documents updated. Honey why don't you and the girls have a nice day shopping for Becky's new wardrobe. Oh and make sure she blends in. We don't want anyone questioning her.

13131.content:
You couldn't move. You were in utter shock. How could this be happening?

“Come on sis, we got to get you dressed I guess.” You heard Candice say as she hooked your arm and lead you towards her room. “So it looks like you are about my size, but you are too big for one of my bras….. You are going to have to borrow one from mom ....” The next 30 min felt like an eternity. It was a whirlwind of tight revealing clothing. The underwear was first. Your step daughters didn't have much in the way of modesty, and the ones that were more modest were not quite big enough to fit your new booty. You ended up getting a very tiny baby blue thong and you couldn't help but blush when your wife came in with a bra that would almost fit.

“Here you go honey. This will probably work” It was a dark purple push up bra. You used to love this bra, but not now. “Here let me help you honey, but you are going to have to learn to do this yourself.” That was it. That was the last straw.

“How can you be ok with this! How come you are not fighting against this!” Your voice started to rise. You just wish you sounded more intimidating. “Come on! Don't give in! Don't be a…”

“Stop it! Stop it right now!” Your wife Lisa shouted back scolding and startling you. “You have no idea what he is capable of! It is a miracle I got away from Walter when I did, and I won't even begin to tell you what I had to do to get my daughters. So, here is what we are going to do, young lady.” That last bit really hit home. “ We are going to go to the mall and buy you close that any teenage girl who looks like you would wear, and your sisters are going to help you look fashionable. We are going to listen to your father until I figure out how we can get out of this. Now do you all understand.” Kendra and Candice both shook their head in agreement, and your wife's attention turned to you. “Becky…… do you understand”

“ Yes I understand”

“Good! Now finish getting dressed girls”

Once your…”mom” helped you put your bra on she left and your sister continued to get you dressed. They gave you a tiny black crop top that showed off a good amount of cleavage and your new tummy. Next was a tiny pair of shorts that really cupped your juicy ass. Lastly was a pair of high heels.

“I can't walk in these '' you whined as you stood on these things that felt like stilts.

You walked down the stairs to your new parents. Your wife looked determined and your “daddy” stared at you with a satisfied grin. You couldn't believe you were about to walk outside in this body, and these clothes.

https://www.listal.com/viewimage/1162203...

As you walked to the care Candice sat up front leaving you in the back. This being your new spot now that you were the youngest.

The ride was fairly uneventful. As you were stopped at an intersection you rolled your window down to get some fresh air, hoping it would help keep you calm. You were unaware that in the care next you was a black SUV filled with a bunch of douchey looking bros. Once they saw you their windows rolled down immediately.

“Hey sexy. You busy tonight? “you looked over dumbfounded.” Scared you rolled up the window. Unaware that Candice rolled down the front window.

“Don't worry boys she's just shy. Were headed to the mall maybe we will see you their” She shouted to them as you drove through the intersection.

“What did you do that for!” you screamed.

“What… Didn't you hear mom? We have to do what dad said, and he said he wanted you to pass as a teen girl. Any teen girl who looks like you would be openly flirting with those boys!”

“She's right honey.” You heard your wife say “You're going to have to learn to flirt like and act like a girl who looks like you” Not only were you trapped in this body for the foreseeable future but you had to act like some teen tart. “Were here.”

15.content:
Corporate Takeover: You’re the CEO of one of the world’s most successful tech company. You live a life of luxury with a mansion, multiple sport cars, and a sexy trophy wife. Yet a group of your rivals want to remove you from the picture and take everything you have as they do it.

Sacking the Quarterback: What happens when a Pro-Football player is turned into a high school cheerleader? You’re one of American Footballs greatest quarterbacks, who has lead your team to multiple championships victories. You’re a household name, but your backup wants you gone.

Back of the hog: You’re the founder and leader of the biker gang “The Hellhounds”. You and your boys demand respect by everyone, but when you cross the wrong woman in a bar, your place in the Hellhounds may be changed.
15.title: More Options

151.content:
You smile at your reflection in the mirror as you straightened your tie. It was the same one you wore in the Time Magazine cover photoshoot a few months back.

You walk back into the master bedroom and saw your wife Dana still sleeping on your bed. Her long blonde hair was a mess. You thought about waking her, but you decided it wasn’t really worth your time. You didn’t marry her for conversation, but for that smoking body of her.

You walked through your mansion. As you were leaving the kitchen, you found one of your maids (you had no idea of her name. She was the younger Hispanic one) and gave her a firm slap on her ass. She gave a startled yelp, which made you laughed.

The girl turned to you and said something in Spanish.

“You have a problem?” You say as intimidating as you can.

“No! No Mr.Black!” She says quickly hoping to not risk losing her job.

“Good.” You answer not even looking at her as you head to your garage. You looked over your collection of cars and decide to go with the Red Ferrari today.

You are Tom Black, owner of Black Inc. You are one of America’s greatest success stories. A college dropout, who helped found a small tech start up, and lead it to becoming one of the world biggest and richest. You are a household name, who have used your money and technology to make the world a better place. You are considered the greatest mind of your generation.

What most people don’t know, is the fact that your best friend Nick Norton was actually the brains behind the company whose inventions made it successful, but you knew that he was going to no longer need you after awhile so you blackmailed him into giving over the entire company over to you.

After that you hired a team of investors to work for your company, but through your legal team you made it so all their works are put under your name.

Anyone who has tried to interfere with your success usually find themselves blackmailed, discredited, or even died.

You arrived at Black inc. headquarters parking garage, and walked to your private elevator. You pass your security team who after seeing you arrive immediately start to kiss up to you. You smile and think “It’s good to be the king.” as enter the elevator and head to your office.

When you reach the top floor you step out and walk down the long hallway which is decorated by “your” inventions.

At the end of the hall is your secretary’s office, and sitting at the desk in the middle of the room is Miss Akie Yamamoto. Akie is the daughter of a former tech rival from Japan who you blackmail into selling his company over to you. Apart of the deal was that his daughter would have to move to America and join your staff, and now you make this young investor work only as your private secretary.

“Good morning Mr.Black. Security has called that your 9 o’clock appointment has arrived.” Akie says as she hands you your coffee. She makes sure not to meet your eyes. You take the drink without saying a word and enter into your office.

You walk to your desk and take a seat. You sip your coffee. “Yes it is truly great to be king.” You say to yourself.
151.title: Corporate Takeover

154.content: Playing the Game- A man signs up for a reality tv show where he has to propose to a woman site unseen (Love is Blind on Netflix). The only problem is he gets put on the wrong side of the wall. The entire mansion and pods are automated so the only way out is as another mans fiance. How far will he be willing to go to win another man over. Will his fellow female contestants help him or hurt him? What will he do after the proposal? Lets find out. (please feel free to add to this or any of my other stories.)
154.title: More Choices!

1541.content:
Your name was Devin and you were getting pretty tired of being single. Now don't get me wrong you really enjoyed being single. You loved going to the bars and picking up chicks but the one night stands were starting to get old. You were wanting something a little more serious. The player lifestyle was a young mans game and you were 31 and you were the last of your friends who were still single. One day you received an email from the streaming service Showflix. You clicked on it and were surprised that you won a spot on the new upcoming reality dating show called "Dating Blind". You read more into it and apparently this show took 8 women and put them in a house and they would be going on dates with men in search of finding the "one". The men were staying in another house and would only be able to talk to the women through a screen. For the men the point of the games was to get a women to say yes to their proposal. The women had to get the men to propose. After reading more you learned that the house was one of those new auto houses. It was built to serve either men or woman and make sure they were always taken care of. This sounded amazing but you were confused you never entered to be on this game show. You then spot another email from your sister.

" Hey Devin,

Please don't hate me but I entered you into a contest to be on a dating game, and you won! All you have to do is go to the house and meet the love of your life. I know this is sudden but I know how sad you have been being alone and I thought this could really work. I hope you give it a try.

Love,

Janet"

Of course it was Janet. She always hated your single lifestyle. That was probably because you slept with most of her friends. She was right though what could it hurt. The next morning you got in your car and drove to the address on the email.

You pulled up to see two beautiful mansions. One was painted white and purple and the other house was painted white and blue. You showed your admission letter to a guard at the gate and he directed you to park on the purple side. You get out of your car. This was so weird you thought to yourself as you walked up the steps. The email said that clothes would be provided so you had no luggage. You walked through the front doors and followed the signs with your name on it until you found your room. Why was your name written in pink. Once you walked in the door behind you closed and locked. You heard a famine voice coming from a speaker somewhere in the room.

"Welcome Devin! You are one of the first contestants on "Love is Blind". Before we get started you have to get ready to meet the other brides!" Other brides? you thought you wouldn't meet your bride till after you proposed. " After you get undressed we will provide a full makeover to make sure you look your best. Then you will be provided with a new set of clothes. Your suitors may not be able to see your face but as the show progresses you will have opportunities to send your new Beaus seductive images and even more" OH No! what is happening " Now lets get you ready to meet the man of your dreams."

"I am going to kill my sister. "You think to yourself.
1541.title: Playing the game

info.brief_description: Stories about powerful men/boys being manipulated and bullied into becoming sexy women.
info.description:
Here is my first venture into writing my own material. These are going to be a collection of stories where powerful guys (CEO's, rich jerks, high school athletes,ect) are turned into the very women they felt entitled to. They are forced and tricked into prancing, strutting, and preening while they do all things girly and slutty. How will these once dominate men cope with having to flirt with men they once viewed as peers while the people who put them their watch on.

A few rules- No bathroom play or skat. light bondage is OK as long as it its not the main point. No children or baby chapter. Finally please make all chapters contribute to the ongoing story, if there is a "no, then what?" type chapters I will remove them.

Please enjoy.
